text: Gladky Mys () is a rural locality (a village) in Toykinskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 14 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located on the Chyornaya River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Gladky Mys
